name: cwa-book-downloader
description: Automated Book Downloader extends Calibre-Web by adding automatic ebook discovery and downloads via search providers. It integrates with libraries to streamline collection growth with minimal manual intervention.

features.title: Automatic Discovery
features.description: Find and download ebooks automatically. Grow your library effortlessly

features.title: Calibre Integration
features.description: Seamless connection with Calibre-Web. Enhanced library management

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Multiple sources for finding books. Comprehensive coverage

features.title: Minimal Intervention
features.description: Set it up and let it work. Hands-off collection building

features.title: Metadata Handling
features.description: Proper book information and organization. Clean library structure

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Manage your ebook automation privately. Your library, your control
